_header: Kings state if thou will lead
_description: Against young men’s counsel — four lines (aabb) in Fordun’s Scotichronicon (Book 14, Chap. 4)

EDU186.Transcription:
Kyngis state gif þow will ledeTill old menis consall tak gude
                    hedeRoboam his kyngdam lesitȝoung mennis consall for he
                    chesit
EDU186.Editions:
Hearne,  Thomas,
                        ed.  
             Johannis de Fordun, Scotichronicon.
         2 vols. Oxford: Sheldonian, 1722; Edinburgh, 1759: 2.344.
